field.name: consistent_read
field.description: If true, a strongly consistent read is used; if false (the default), an eventually consistent read is used.

field.name: node_refs
field.description: When "node_refs" is supplied it SHOULD be used to perform the request. The "node_refs" and "slugs" are analogous to protobuf unions in that only one of these should exist and the priority of selection is as ordered in this schema.
